general.title: New Store Location!
general.content: We have moved to a new location! Visit us at Bürgermeister-Aurnhammer-Straße 5, 86199 Augsburg.

general.title: Visit us at Cardmarket!
general.content: Check our store out at Cardmarket! To browse our products please visit us at Cardmarket.

general.title: Welcome to Table Flip!
general.content: We are excited to launch our new homepage. Stay tuned for updates!
